pull.title: consensus: Improve CScriptNum error reporting
pull.body:
This is a rebased, split up version of #15074. I'm going to leave this open for a week to see if it attracts any Concept ACKs, otherwise I'll close it.

Changes from the original PR are removing an errant newline in [this catch block](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16881/commits/87a8cbf5dccb76224b2934a2ee281a475cc04711#diff-be2905e2f5218ecdbe4e55637dac75f3R1075), and splitting the [`assert opcodes are in a valid range`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16881/commits/7260d6b5ec305f320e9fcfae03bdfc1129c093c1) change from the error reporting changes.

These changes had been looked at by meshcolider and ajtowns, so have re-notified them.

verification.payload:
tree 9395063462d99f863309103cb47da3e27173d53d
parent 9debfd0e28413df1ba669f614aa44bb652fedb32
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1568619058 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1568619492 +0800

consensus: Improve CScriptNum error reporting

Instead of reporting "unknown error", more specific messages are returned for CScriptNum related errors.

Original PR: #15074

Co-Authored-By: Johnson Lau <jl2012@xbt.hk>

verification.payload:
tree 7aa5f3c660987022ab8055f2d1a0703de1cbb77b
parent 87a8cbf5dccb76224b2934a2ee281a475cc04711
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1568619200 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1568619509 +0800

consensus: assert that opcodes are in a valid range

Replace throw with assert in case opcode is negative or bigger than 0xff, which should never happen.

Original PR: 15074

Co-Authored-By: Johnson Lau <jl2012@xbt.hk>

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

comments.body: Throwing a bare enum (or anything not deriving from `std::exception`)  is a bit strange in C++. I think if you want to add an error code it'd be better to add an error code field to the `scriptnum_error` class and its constructor, and keep throwing that.
